name: Desaturate
description:
Desaturate

Quickly desaturate one or many layers with image fills. If you work in grayscale and have to manually desaturate images many times a day, this is the plugin for you.


Usage

Select the layers you want to desaturate and run the plugin. When selecting a frame or a group, it automatically desaturates all children layers as well.


After running the plugin once, use the "Run Last Plugin" shortcut (⌥⌘P / Alt + Ctrl + P) to run the plugin rapidly.


To undo desaturation, use the undo shortcut (⌘Z / Ctrl + Z) like usual.


Open Source

Desaturate is an open source project. Check it out here.
